org.apache.flink.api.common.functions

接口 MapPartitionFunction<T,O>

  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the input elements.
    O - Type of the returned elements.
    所有超级接口:
    Function, java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    AssignRangeIndex, PythonMapPartition, RangeBoundaryBuilder, RichMapPartitionFunction, SampleInPartition, SampleWithFraction

    @Public
public interface MapPartitionFunction<T,O>
extends Function, java.io.Serializable
    Interface for "mapPartition" functions. A "mapPartition" function is called a single time per data partition receives an Iterable with data elements of that partition. It may return an arbitrary number of data elements.

    This function is intended to provide enhanced flexibility in the processing of elements in a partition. For most of the simple use cases, consider using the MapFunction or FlatMapFunction.

    The basic syntax for a MapPartitionFunction is as follows: 

    
 DataSet<X> input = ...;
 
 DataSet<Y> result = input.mapPartition(new MyMapPartitionFunction());

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void mapPartition(java.lang.Iterable<T> values, Collector<O> out)
      A user-implemented function that modifies or transforms an incoming object.

    • 方法详细资料

      • mapPartition

        void mapPartition(java.lang.Iterable<T> values,
                  Collector<O> out)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        A user-implemented function that modifies or transforms an incoming object.
        参数:
        values - All records for the mapper
        out - The collector to hand results to.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
